1370: Ghela moved to De Tuyt.C.2 after marriage.
Got married to Jonghen at age 19 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Moerseil in 1371 at age 20.
1372: Gave birth to Amelgeir in 1372 at age 21.
1374: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 4 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Mourin in 1375 at age 24.
1376: Gave birth to Dilane in 1376 at age 25.
1378: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1378 at age 27.
1381: Gave birth to Siwa in 1381 at age 30.
1384: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1384 at age 33.
1385: Gave birth to Lubertus in 1385 at age 34.
1387: Lost son Mourin when Mourin was 13 years old.
1389: Gave birth to Guido in 1389 at age 38.
1393: Lost daughter Amelgeir when Amelgeir was 21 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Lost daughter Siwa when Siwa was 13 years old.
